data.headline: Product Manager | Self-Taught Developer
data.summary: Passionate self-taught developer with a keen interest in product management. Experienced in creating and launching successful digital products. Skilled in agile methodologies, user research, and cross-functional collaboration.

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and launch a new SaaS product, resulting in a 25% increase in customer acquisition
Conducted user research and market analysis to identify pain points and inform product roadmap
Implemented agile methodologies to streamline product development and delivery

experience.title: Product Management Intern
bullets: Assisted in the development and launch of a new mobile app, contributing to a 20% increase in user engagement
Participated in user testing sessions and analyzed feedback to improve the product's user experience
Supported the team in managing the product backlog and prioritizing feature development

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal website using React and Gatsby to showcase my projects and skills.

projects.name: Expense Tracker App
projects.description: Built a mobile-friendly expense tracking application using React Native and Firebase, allowing users to manage their personal finances.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate has a friendly, confident expression and is dressed in business casual attire.
